casebody.data:
SIOUX NATION OF INDIANS, ET AL. v. THE UNITED STATES No. 148-78

[220 Ct. Cl. 442,

601 F. 2d 1157,

448 U.S. 371, 220 Ct. Cl. 738]

On November 21, 1980 the court awarded reimbursement of attorneys’ expenses to Marvin J. Sonosky of $12,802.69 and to Arthur Lazarus, Jr., of $16,435.82, with said amounts to be paid out of the award of $105,994,430.52 appropriated for and paid to plaintiffs on July 22, 1980.
